title: Wireless Bluetooth Headphones
description: Premium wireless headphones with active noise cancellation, 30-hour battery life, and comfortable over-ear design. Features Bluetooth 5.0 connectivity.

description: Advanced fitness tracker with heart rate monitor, GPS, sleep tracking, and 7-day battery. Water resistant to 50m.

title: USB-C Fast Charger 65W
description: GaN technology 65W USB-C fast charger compatible with laptops, tablets, and phones. Compact and travel-friendly.

title: 4K Ultra HD Webcam
description: Professional 4K webcam with auto-focus, built-in microphone, and adjustable ring light. Perfect for streaming and video calls.

title: The Art of Programming
description: Comprehensive guide to modern software development covering algorithms, data structures, and best practices. 800+ pages.

title: Sci-Fi Novel: Beyond the Stars
description: Award-winning science fiction novel exploring the boundaries of human exploration across the galaxy. A page-turner.

title: Cookbook: World Flavors
description: 200+ recipes from around the world with step-by-step instructions and beautiful photography. Hardcover edition.

title: Self-Help: Mindful Living
description: Transform your daily routine with practical mindfulness techniques. Bestseller with over 1 million copies sold.

title: Men's Classic Fit Cotton T-Shirt
description: Premium 100% cotton crew neck t-shirt. Pre-shrunk, comfortable fit. Available in 12 colors.

title: Women's Running Shoes
description: Lightweight running shoes with responsive cushioning and breathable mesh upper. Great for daily training.

title: Unisex Waterproof Jacket
description: Lightweight waterproof jacket with sealed seams, adjustable hood, and packable design. Perfect for hiking.

title: Denim Jeans Slim Fit
description: Classic slim-fit denim jeans with stretch comfort. Durable construction with a modern look.

title: Stainless Steel Cookware Set (10-Piece)
description: Professional-grade stainless steel cookware set. Includes pots, pans, and lids. Dishwasher and oven safe.

description: Smart robot vacuum with laser navigation, 2500Pa suction, and automatic emptying. Works with Alexa and Google Home.

title: Memory Foam Pillow (2-Pack)
description: Cooling gel memory foam pillows with breathable bamboo cover. Ergonomic design for side and back sleepers.

title: Air Fryer 5.8 Quart
description: Digital air fryer with 8 preset cooking functions, non-stick basket, and rapid air technology. BPA-free.

title: Yoga Mat Premium 6mm
description: Non-slip yoga mat with alignment lines, eco-friendly TPE material, and carrying strap. 72" x 24".

title: Adjustable Dumbbell Set
description: Adjustable dumbbells from 5-52.5 lbs each. Quick-change weight system replaces 15 sets of dumbbells.

title: Camping Tent 4-Person
description: Waterproof 4-person dome tent with easy setup. Includes rainfly, gear loft, and storage pockets.

description: Latex-free resistance bands with 5 resistance levels. Includes door anchor, handles, and carry bag.

title: Building Blocks Set (1000 Pieces)
description: Creative building blocks set with 1000 pieces in 15 colors. Compatible with major brands. Ages 4+.

title: Strategy Board Game
description: Award-winning strategy board game for 2-5 players. Average playtime 60-90 minutes. Ages 10+.

title: RC Drone with Camera
description: Beginner-friendly drone with 1080p camera, 20-min flight time, and one-key return. Includes carrying case.

title: Puzzle 1000 Pieces - World Map
description: Premium quality 1000-piece jigsaw puzzle featuring a detailed vintage world map. Finished size 27" x 20".
